GE07bhg4c08u:2: kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama /
GE07bhg4c08u:3: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate //1//
GE07bhg4c08u:6: ity uktaṃ brahma-karmādi spaṣṭam aṣṭama ucyate //
GE07bhg4c08u:7: pūrvādhyāyānte bhagavatopakṣiptānāṃ brahmādhyātmādi-saptānāṃ padarthānāṃ tattvaṃ jijñāsur arjuna uvāca kiṃ tad brahmeti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c08u:9: madhusūdanaḥ - pūrvādhyāyānte te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam
GE07bhg4c08u:10: ity ādinā sārdha-ślokena sapta-padārthā jñeyatvena bhagavatā sūtritās teṣāṃ vṛtti-sthānīyo
GE07bhg4c08u:12: tatra sūtritāni sapta-vastūni viśeṣato bubhutsamānaḥ ślokābhyām /
GE07bhg4c08u:13: taj-jñeyatvenoktaṃ brahma kiṃ sopādhikaṃ nirupādhikaṃ vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:14: evam ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya tasminn adhiṣṭhāne tiṣṭhatīty adhyātmaṃ kiṃ śrotrādikaraṇa-grāmo vā pratyak-caitanyaṃ vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:15: tathā karma cākhilam ity atra kiṃ karma yajña-rūpam anyad vā vijñāntaṃ yajñaṃ tanute karmāṇi tanute 'pi ca iti śrutau dvaividhya-śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:16: tava mama ca samatvāt kathaṃ tvaṃ māṃ pṛcchasīti śaṅkām apanudan sarva-puruṣebhya uttamasya sarvajñasya tava na kiṃcid ajñeyam iti saṃbodhanena sūcayati he puruṣottameti /
GE07bhg4c08u:17: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktaṃ pṛthivyādibhūtam adhikṛtya yat kiṃcit kāryam adhibhūta-padena vivakṣitaṃ kiṃ vā samastam eva kārya-jātam /
GE07bhg4c08u:19: adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate devatā-viṣayam anudhyānaṃ vā sarvadaivateṣv ādiyta-maṇḍalādiṣv anusyūtaṃ caitanyaṃ vā //1//
GE07bhg4c08u:22: śuddhāṃ ca bhaktiṃ provāca dve gatī api cāsṭame //
GE07bhg4c08u:24: atra teṣāṃ tattvaṃ jijñāsuḥ pṛcchati dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c08u:26: sa cāsmin dehe kathaṃ jñeya ity uttarasyānusaṅgī //1-2//
GE07bhg4c08u:28: utkān pṛṣṭaḥ kramād vyākhyad brahmādīn harir aṣṭame /
GE07bhg4c08u:29: yoga-miśrāṃ ca śuddhāṃ ca bhakti-mārga-dvayaṃ tathā //
GE07bhg4c08u:30: pūrvādhyāyānte mumukṣāṇāṃ jñeyatayoddiṣṭān brahmādīn saptārthān viboddhum arjunaḥ pṛcchati /
GE07bhg4c08u:31: kiṃ tad brahmeti kiṃ paramātma-caitanyaṃ vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:32: kiṃ jīvātma-caitanyaṃ vā tad brahmety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:33: kim adhyātmam iti ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtyeti nirukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:34: śrotrādīndriya-vṛndaṃ vā sūkṣma-bhūta-vṛndaṃ vā tad iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:35: āvayos taulyāt kim iti māṃ pṛcchasīti śaṅkāṃ nivartayituṃ sambodhanaṃ he puruṣottameti /
GE07bhg4c08u:36: pareśatvāt tava sarvaṃ suviditaṃ na tu memeti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:37: adhibhūtaṃ ca kim iti bhūtāny adhikṛtyeti nirukter ghaṭyādi-kāryaṃ vā sthūla-śarīraṃ vā tad iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:38: adhidaivaṃ kim iti devatā-viṣayakam anudhyānaṃ vā samaṣṭir virāṭ vā tad iti //1//
GE07bhg4c08u:43: atra dehe you yajño nivartate tasmin ko 'dhiyajño 'dhiṣṭhātā /
GE07bhg4c08u:44: prayojakaḥ phala-dātā ca ka ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:45: svarūpaṃ pṛṣṭvādhiṣṭhāna-prakāraṃ pṛcchati - kathaṃ kena prakāreṇāsāv asmin dehe sthito yajñam adhitiṣṭhantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:47: anta-kāle ca niyata-cittaiḥ puruṣaiḥ kathaṃ kenopāyena jñeyo 'si //2//
GE07bhg4c08u:48: madhusūdanaḥ - adhiyajño yajñam adhigato devatātmā vā para-brahma vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:49: sa ca kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa cintanīyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:51: sarvathāpi sa kim asmin dehe vartate tato bahir vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:52: dehe cet sa ko 'tra buddhyādis tad-vyatirikto vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:54: kintu saprakāra eka eva praśna iti draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c08u:55: parama-kāruṇikatvād āyāsenāpi sarvopadrava-nivārakasya bhagavato 'nāyāsena mat-sanehopadrava-nivāraṇam īṣatkaram ucitam eveti sūcayan sambodhayati he madhusūdaneti /
GE07bhg4c08u:56: prayāṇa-kāle ca sarva-karaṇa-grāma-vaiyāgryāc citta-samādhānānupapatteḥ kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa niyatātmabhiḥ samāhita-cittairjñeyo 'sīty ukta-śaṅkā-sūcanārthaś cakāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:57: etat sarvaṃ sarvajñatvāt parama-kāruṇikatvāc ca śaraṇāgataṃ māṃ prati kathayety abhiprāyaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c08u:59: baladevaḥ - adhiyajñaḥ ka iti yajñam adhigata indrādir vā viṣṇur vā sa iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:60: katham iti tasyādhiyajña-bhāvaḥ katham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:61: etat sarvaṃ mat-sandeha-nivāraṇaṃ taveṣatkaram iti bodhayituṃ sambodhanaṃ - he madhusūdaneti /
GE07bhg4c08u:62: prayāṇeti tadā sarvendriya-vyagratayā citta-samādhānāsmabhavād iti bhāvaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c08u:67: śrīdharaḥ - praśna-krameṇaivottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca akṣaram iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:70: paramaṃ yad akṣaraṃ jagato mūla-kāraṇaṃ tad braham /
GE07bhg4c08u:71: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantīti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:72: svasyaiva brahmaṇa evāṃśatayā jīva-rūpeṇa bhavanaṃ svabhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:73: sa evātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya bhoktṛtvena vartamāno 'dhyātma-śabdenocyate ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:77: ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajā //
GE07bhg4c08u:79: tau bhūta-bhāvodbhavau karoti yo visargo devatoddeśena dravya-tyāga-rūpo yajñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:80: sarva-karmaṇām upalakṣaṇam etat sa ca karma-śabda-vācyaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c08u:81: madhusūdanaḥ - evaṃ saptānāṃ praśnānāṃ krameṇottaraṃ tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:82: praśna-krameṇa hi nirṇaye praṣṭur abhīṣṭa-siddhir anāyāsena syādity abhiprāyavān bhagavān atra śloke praśna-trayaṃ krameṇa nirdhāritavān /
GE07bhg4c08u:83: evaṃ dvitīya-śloke 'pi praśna-trayaṃ tṛtīya-śloke tv ekam iti vibhāgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:84: nirupādhikam eva brahmātra vivakṣitaṃ brahma-śabdena na tu sopādhikam iti prathama-praśnasyottaram āha - akṣaraṃ na kṣaratīty avināśi aśnute vā sarvam iti sarva-vyāpakam /
GE07bhg4c08u:85: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam anaṇu ity ādy upakramya
GE07bhg4c08u:86: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryā-candramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ nānyad ato
GE07bhg4c08u:87: 'sti draṣṭṛ śrutir ityādi madhye parāmṛśya etasmin tu khalv akṣarae gārgy ākāśa otaś
GE07bhg4c08u:88: ca protaś ca ity upasaṃhṛtaṃ śrutyā /
GE07bhg4c08u:92: nirupādhikaṃ caitanyaṃ tad iha brahmeti vivakṣitam /
GE07bhg4c08u:94: paramaṃ sva-prakāśa-paramānanda-rūpaṃ praśāsanasya kṛtsna-jaḍa-varga-dhāraṇasya ca liṅgasya tatraivopapatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:96: na tv ihākṣara-śabdasya varṇa-mātre rūḍhatvāc chruti-liṅgādhikaraṇa-nyāya-mūlakena
GE07bhg4c08u:97: rūḍhir yogam apaharati iti nyāyena rathakāra-śabdena jāti-viśeṣavat-praṇavākhyam
GE07bhg4c08u:99: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahmeti ca pareṇa viśeṣaṇāt ānaarthakya-pratihatānāṃ viparītaṃ balābalam iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:100: varṣāsu rathakāra ādadhīta ity atra tu jāti-viśeṣe nāsty asambhava iti viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:101: ananyathā-siddhena tu liṅgena śruter bādhaḥ ākāśas tal-liṅgāt ity ādau vivṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:103: ananyathā-siddhena liṅgena śruter bādhe yatra yogaḥ sambhavati tatra sa eva gṛhyate mukhyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:104: yathājyaiḥ stuvate pṛṣṭaiḥ stuvata ity ādau /
GE07bhg4c08u:106: yatra tu yogo 'pi na sambhavati tatra gauṇī vṛttir yathākāśa-prāṇādi-śabdeṣu /
GE07bhg4c08u:108: brahmaṇi ā samantāt kāśata iti yogaḥ sambhavatīti cet /
GE07bhg4c08u:110: tathā ca parāmarṣaṃ sūtraṃ prasiddheś ca (Vs 1.3.17) iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:112: tad evaṃ kiṃ tad brahmeti nirṇītam /
GE07bhg4c08u:114: yad akṣaraṃ brahmety uktaṃ tasyaiva svabhāvaḥ svo bhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ pratyak-caitanyaṃ na tu svasya bhāva iti ṣaṣṭhī-samāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:117: tasmān na brahmaṇaḥ saṃbandhi kintu brahma-svarūpam eva /
GE07bhg4c08u:118: ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya bhoktṛtayā vartamānam adhyātmam ucyate 'dhyātma-śabdenābhidhīyate na karaṇa-grāma ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:119: yāga-dāna-homātmakaṃ vaidikaṃ karmaivātra karma-śabdena vivikṣitam iti tṛtīya-praśnottaram
GE07bhg4c08u:120: āha bhūtānāṃ bhavana-dharmakāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ sthāvara-jaṅgamānāṃ bhāvam utpattim udbhavaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:121: vṛddhiṃ ca karoti yo visargas tyāgasta-tac-chāstra-vihito yāga-dāna-homātmakaḥ sa
GE07bhg4c08u:124: tatra devatoddeśena dravya-tyāgo yāga uttiṣṭhad dhomo vaṣaṭ-kāra-prayogāntaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:130: ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ // iti smṛteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:131: te vā ete āhutī hute utkrāmataḥ ity ādi śruteś ca //3//
GE07bhg4c08u:133: na kṣaratīti akṣaraṃ nityaṃ yat paramaṃ tad brahma-- etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantīti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:134: svabhāvaḥ svātmānaṃ dehādhyāsa-vaśād bhāvayati janayatīti svabhāvaḥ jīvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:135: yad vā svaṃ bhāvayati paramātmānaṃ prāpayatīti svabhāvaḥ śuddha-jīvo 'dhyātmam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:137: bhūtair eva bhāvānāṃ manuṣyādi-dehānām udbhavaṃ karotīti sa visargo jīvasya saṃsāraḥ karma-janyatvāt karma-saṃjñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:138: karma-śabdena jīvasya saṃsāra ucyata ity arthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c08u:139: baladevaḥ - evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān krameṇa saptānām uttaram āha akṣaram iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:140: na kṣaratīti nirkter akṣaraṃ yat paramaṃ dehādi-viviktaṃ jīvātma-caitanyaṃ tan mayā brahmety ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:141: tasyākṣara-śabdatvaṃ brahma-śabdatvaṃ ca-avyaktam akṣare līyate 'kṣaraṃ tamasi līyate tama ekībhavati parasminn iti vijñānaṃ brahma ced veda iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:143: svasya jīvātmanaḥ sambandhī yo bhāvo bhūta-sūkṣma-tad-vāsanā-lakṣaṇa-padārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:144: pañcāgni-vidyāyāṃ paṭhitas tad-ātmani saṃbadhyamānatvān mayādhyātmam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:145: bhūteti teṣāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ sthūlais taiḥ saṃpṛktānāṃ bhāvo manuṣyādi-lakṣaṇas tad-udbhava-karas tad-utpādako yo visargaḥ sa karma saṃjñitaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:147: yaḥ karma-śeṣo bhuvi manuṣyādi-deha-lābhāya visṛṣṭas tan mayā karmocyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:148: chāndogye dyu-parjanya-pṛthivī-puruṣa-yoṣitsu pañcasv agniṣu śraddhā-soma-vṛṣṭy-anna-retāṃsi kramāt pañcāhutayaḥ paṭhyante /
GE07bhg4c08u:149: tatrāyam arthaḥ - vaidiko jīva iha loke 'smayāni dadhy-ādīni śraddhayā juhoti /
GE07bhg4c08u:150: tā dadhy-ādimayyaḥ pañcīkṛtatvāt pañca-bhūta-rūpā āpaḥ śraddhayā hutatvāt śraddhākhyāhuti-svarūpeṇa tasmin jīve saṃbaddhās tiṣṭhanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:154: hutāstāḥ soma-rājākhya-divya-dehatayā pariṇamante tena dehena sa tatra karma-phalāni bhuṅkte /
GE07bhg4c08u:155: tad-bhogāvasāne 'smayo jīvavān dehais tair devaiḥ parjanyāgnau huto vṛṣṭir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c08u:156: vṛṣṭi-bhūtās tāḥ sajīvāḥ pṛthivy-agnau tair hutā brīhy-ādy-anna-bhāvaṃ labhante /
GE07bhg4c08u:157: anna-bhūtāḥ sajīvās tāḥ puruṣāgnau hutā reto-bhāvaṃ bhajante /
GE07bhg4c08u:158: reto-bhūtāḥ sa-jīvās tā yoṣid-agnau tair hutā garbhātmanā sthitā manuṣya-bhāvaṃ prayāntīti tad-bhāva-hetur anuśaya-śabda-vācyaḥ karma-śeṣaḥ karmeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:159: evam evoktaṃ sūtrakṛtā tad-antara-pratipattau ity ādibhiḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c08u:165: bhūtaṃ prāṇi-mātram adhikṛtya bhavatīty adhibhūtam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:166: puruṣo vairājaḥ sūrya-maṇḍala-madhyavartī svāṃśa-bhūta-sarva-devatānām adhipatir adhidaivatam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:168: sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:169: ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ brahmāgre samavartata // iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:170: atrāsmin dehe 'ntaryāmitvena sthito 'ham evādhiyajño yajñādi-karma-pravartakas tat-phala-dātā ca /
GE07bhg4c08u:171: katham ity asyāpy uttaram anenaivoktaṃ bhraṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c08u:178: deha-bhṛtāṃ madhye śreṣṭheti sambodhayaṃs tvam apy evambhūtam antaryāmiṇaṃ parādhīna-sva-pravṛtti-nivṛtty-anvaya-vyatirekābhyāṃ boddhum arhasīti sūcayati //4//
GE07bhg4c08u:179: madhusūdanaḥ - sampraty agrima-praśna-trayasyottaram āha adhibhūtam iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:180: kṣaratīti kṣaro vināśī bhāvo yat kiṃcij janimad vastu bhūtaṃ prāṇi-jātam adhikṛtya bhavatīty adhibhūtam ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:181: puruṣo hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samaṣṭi-liṅgātmā vyaṣṭi-sarva-karaṇānugrāhakaḥ ātmaivedam agra
GE07bhg4c08u:182: āsīt puruṣavidhaḥ ity upakramya sa yat pūrvo 'smāt sarvasvmāt sarvān pāpmana auṣattasmāt
GE07bhg4c08u:184: sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:187: adhidaivataṃ daivatāny ādityādīn adhikṛtya cakṣur-ādi-karaṇāny anugṛhṇātīti /
GE07bhg4c08u:189: sarva-yajñābhimāninī viṣṇv-ākhyā devatā yajño vai viṣṇuḥ iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:190: sa ca viṣṇur adhiyajño 'haṃ vāsudeva eva na mad-bhinnaḥ kaścit /
GE07bhg4c08u:191: ataeva para-brahmaṇaḥ sakāśād atyantābhedenaiva pratipattavya iti katham iti vyākhyātam /
GE07bhg4c08u:192: sa cātrāsmin manuṣya-dehe yajña-rūpeṇa vartate buddhyādi-vyatirikto viṣṇu-rūpatvāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:193: etena sa kim asmin dehe tato bahir vā dehe cet ko 'tra buddhyādis tad vyatirikto veti sandeho nirastaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:195: puruṣo vai yajñaḥ puruṣas tena yajño yad enaṃ puruṣas tanute ity ādi śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:196: he deha-bhṛtāṃ vara sarva-prāṇināṃ śreṣṭheti sambodhayan pratikṣaṇaṃ mat-sambhāṣaṇāt kṛtakṛtyas tvam etad-bodha-yogyo 'sīti protsāhayaty arjunaṃ bhagavān /
GE07bhg4c08u:198: viśvanāthaḥ --- kṣaro naśvaro bhāvaḥ padārtho ghaṭa-paṭādir adhibhūtam adhibhūta-śabda-vācyaḥ puruṣaḥ samaṣṭi-virāḍ-adhidaivata-śabda-vācyaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:199: adhikṛtya vartamānāni sūryādi-daivatāni yatra iti tan-nirukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:200: atra dehe 'dhiyajño yajñādi-karma-pravartako 'ntaryāmy ahaṃ mad-aṃśakatvād aham evety
GE07bhg4c08u:201: eva-kāreṇa kathaṃ jñeya ity asyottaram antaryāmitve 'ham eva mad-abhinnatve naiva
GE07bhg4c08u:202: jñeyo na tu adhyātmādir ive mad-bhinnatvenety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:203: dehe deha-bhṛtāṃ vareti tvaṃ tu sākṣān mat-sakhatvāt sarva-śreṣṭha eva bhavasīti bhāvaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c08u:205: kṣaraḥ pratikṣaṇa-pariṇāmī bhāvaḥ sthūlo dehaḥ sa mayādhibhūtam it ucyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:207: puruṣaḥ samaṣṭi-virāṭ sa mayādhidaivam ity ucyate adhikṛtya vartamānāny ādityādīni daivatāny atreti vyutpatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:208: atra dehe 'dhiyajño yajñam adhikṛtya vartata iti vyutpattes tat-pravartakas tat-phala-pradaś cāham eva /
GE07bhg4c08u:211: anena katham ity asyāpy uttaram uktaṃ prādeśa-mātra-vapustvenāntar-niyamayann ahaṃ yajñādi-pravartaka ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:212: tathā ca mad-arcā-sevanād etān brahmādīn saptārthān svarūpato ' śrameṇa vindatīti /
GE07bhg4c08u:215: anta-kāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram /
GE07bhg4c08u:216: yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c08u:217: śrīdharaḥ - prayāṇa-kāle ca jñāyo 'sīty anena pṛṣṭam anta-kāle jñānopāyaṃ tat-phalaṃ ca darśayati anta-kāla iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:218: mām evokta-lakṣaṇam antaryāmi-rūpaṃ parameśvaraṃ smaran dehaṃ tyaktvā yaḥ prakarṣeṇārcir-ādi-mārgeṇottarāyaṇa-pathā yāti sa mad-bhāvaṃ mad-rūpatāṃ yāti /
GE07bhg4c08u:222: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīṃ prayāṇa-kāle ca kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīti saptamasya praśnasyottaram āha anta-kāle ceti /
GE07bhg4c08u:223: mām eva bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam adhiyajñaṃ sa-guṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ vā paramam akṣaraṃ brahma
GE07bhg4c08u:224: na tv adhyātmādikaṃ smaran sadā cintayaṃs tat-saṃskāra-pāṭavāt samasta-karaṇa-grāma-vaiyagryavaty
GE07bhg4c08u:225: anta-kāle 'pi smaran kalevaraṃ muktvā śarīre 'haṃ-mamābhimānaṃ tyaktvā prāṇa-viyoga-kāle
GE07bhg4c08u:226: yaḥ prayāti sa-guṇa-dhyāna-pakṣe 'gnijyotir-ahaḥ-śukla ity ādi-vacyamāṇena deva-yāna-mārgeṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:227: pitṛ-yāna-mārgāt prakarṣeṇa yāti sa upāsako mad-bhāvaṃ mad-rūpatāṃ nirguṇa-brahma-bhāvaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:229: nirguṇa-brahma-smaraṇa-pakṣe tu kalevaraṃ tyaktvā prayātīti loka-dṛṣṭy-abhiprāyaṃ na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanty atraiva samavanīyante iti śrutes
GE07bhg4c08u:231: sa mad-bhāvaṃ sākṣād eva yāti brahmaiva san brahmāpy eti (BAU 4.4.6) iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:232: nāsty atra deha-vyatirikta ātmani mad-bhāva-prāptau vā saṃśayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:234: deha-vyatireke 'pi īśvarād bhinno na veti sandeho na vidyate chidyante sarva-saṃśayāḥ (MuṇḍU 2.2.8) iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:235: atra ca kalevaraṃ muktvā prayātīti dehād bhinnatvaṃ mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti ceśvarād abhinnatvaṃ jīvasyoktam iti draṣṭavyam //5//
GE07bhg4c08u:236: viśvanāthaḥ --- prayāṇa-kāle kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīty asyottaram āha-anta-kāle ceti /
GE07bhg4c08u:237: mām eva smarann iti mat-smaraṇam eva maj-jñānam /
GE07bhg4c08u:238: na tu ghaṭa-paṭādir ivāhaṃ kenāpi tattvato jñātuṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:240: baladevaḥ -- prayāṇa-kāle kathaṃ jñeyo 'sīty asyottaram āha-anteti /
GE07bhg4c08u:241: atra smaraṇātmakena jñānena jñeyo bhavan-mad-bhāvopalambhanaṃ ca tat phalaṃ prayacchāmīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:245: yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalevaram /
GE07bhg4c08u:246: taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c08u:247: śrīdharaḥ - na kevalaṃ māṃ smaran mad-bhāvaṃ prāpnotīti niyamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:249: yaṃ yaṃ bhāvaṃ devatāntaraṃ vānyam api vānta-kāle smaran dehaṃ tyajati taṃ tam eva smaryamāṇaṃ bhāvaṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c08u:251: sadā tad-bhāva-bhāvita iti sarvadā tasya bhāvo bhāvanā anucintanam /
GE07bhg4c08u:253: madhusūdanaḥ - anta-kāle bhagavantam anudhyāyato bhagavat-prāptir niyateti vaditum
GE07bhg4c08u:254: anyad api yatkiṃcid api yat kiṃcit tat-kāle dhyāyato dehaṃ tyajatas tat-prāptir avaśyambhāvinīti
GE07bhg4c08u:256: na kevalaṃ māṃ smaran mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti niyamaḥ kiṃ tarhi yaṃ yaṃ cāpi bhāvaṃ devatā-viśeṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:257: ca-kārād anyad api yat kiṃcid vā smaraṃś cintayann ante prāṇa-viyoga-kāle kalevaraṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:258: tyajati sa taṃ tam eva smaryamāṇaṃ bhāvam eva nānyam eti prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c08u:260: tena cāvaśyānugrāhyatvaṃ tena ca pratāraṇāśaṅkā-śūnyatvam iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:261: anta-kāle smaraṇodyamāsambhave 'pi pūrvābhyāsa-janitā vāsanaiva smṛti-hetur ity āha
GE07bhg4c08u:262: - sadā sarvadā tasmin devatā-viśeṣādau bhāvo bhāvanā vāsanā tad-bhāvaḥ sa bhāvitaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:263: sampādito yena sa tathā bhāvita-tad-bhāva ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:265: tad-bhāvena tac-cintanena bhāvito vāsita-citta iti vā //6//
GE07bhg4c08u:266: viśvanāthaḥ --- mām eva smaran māṃ prāpnotītivan mad-anyam api smaran mad-anyam eva prāpnotīty āha yaṃ yam iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:267: tasya bhāvena bhāvanenānucintanena bhāvito vāsitas tan-mayī-bhūtaḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c08u:268: baladevaḥ - na ca mat-smarteiva mad-bhāvaṃ yātīti niyamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:269: kintv anya-smartāpy anya-bhāvaṃ yātīty āha yaṃ yam iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:272: yathā bharato dehānte mṛgaṃ cintayan mṛgo 'bhūt /
GE07bhg4c08u:273: antima-smṛtiś ca pūrva-smṛti-viṣayaiva bhavatīty āha sadeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:276: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca /
GE07bhg4c08u:279: na tu tadā vivaśasya smaraṇodyamo sambhavati tasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:281: satataṃ smaraṇaṃ ca citta-śuddhiṃ vinā na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c08u:284: evaṃ mayy arpitaṃ manaḥ saṅkalpātmakaṃ buddhiś ca vyavasāyātmikāyena tvayā sa tvaṃ māme va prāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c08u:286: madhusūdanaḥ - yasmād evaṃ pūrva-smaraṇābhyāsa-janitāntyā bhāvanaiva tadānīṃ paravaśasya dehāntara-prāptau kāraṇaṃ tasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:287: tasmān mad-viṣayakāntya-bhāvanotpatty-arthaṃ sarveṣu kāleṣu pūrvam evādareṇa māṃ saguṇam īśvaram anusmara cintaya /
GE07bhg4c08u:288: yady antaḥkaraṇāśuddhi-vaśān na śaknoṣi satatam anusmartuṃ tato 'ntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhaye yudhya ca /
GE07bhg4c08u:292: saṅkalpādhyavasāya-lakṣaṇe mano-buddhī yena tvayā sa tvam īdṛśaḥ sarvadā mac-cintana-paraḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:295: idaṃ ca saguṇa-brahma-cintanam upāsakānām uktaṃ teṣām antya-bhāvanā-sāpekṣatvāt
GE07bhg4c08u:296: / nirguṇa-brahma-jñānināṃ tu jñāna-sama-kālam evājñāna-nivṛtti-lakṣaṇāyā mukteḥ siddhatvān nāsty antya-bhāvanāpekṣeti draṣṭavyam //7//
GE07bhg4c08u:299: baladevaḥ - yasmāt pūrva-smṛtir evāntima-smṛti-hetus tasmāt tvaṃ sarveṣu kāleṣu pratikṣaṇaṃ mām anusmara yudhyasva ca loka-saṅgrahāya yuddhādīni svocitāni karmāṇi kuru /
GE07bhg4c08u:300: evaṃ mayy arpitamanobuddhis tvaṃ mām evaiṣyasi,
GE07bhg4c08u:301: na tv anyad iy atra sandehas te mābhūt //7//
GE07bhg4c08u:305: śrīdharaḥ - santata-smaraṇasya cābhyāso 'ntaraṅga-sādhanam iti darśayann āha abhyāsa-yogeneti /
GE07bhg4c08u:309: ataeva nānyaṃ viṣayaṃ gantuṃ śīlaṃ yasya /
GE07bhg4c08u:311: divyaṃ dyotanātmakaṃ paramaṃ puruṣaṃ parameśvaram anucintayan he pārtha tam eva yātīti //8//
GE07bhg4c08u:312: madhusūdanaḥ - tad evaṃ saptānām api praśnānām uttaram uktvā prayāṇa-kāle bhagavad-anusmaraṇasya bhagavat-prāpti-lakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ vivarītum ārabhate abhyāseti /
GE07bhg4c08u:313: abhyāsaḥ sajātīya-pratyaya-pravāho mayi vijātīya-pratyayānantaritaḥ ṣaṣṭhe prāg vyākhyātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:314: sa eva yogaḥ samādhis tena yuktaṃ tatraiva vyāpṛtam ātmākāra-vṛtti-śūnyaṃ yac cetas
GE07bhg4c08u:315: tena cetasābhyāsa-pāṭavena nānya-gāminā nānyatra viṣayāntare nirodha-prayatnaṃ vināpi
GE07bhg4c08u:316: gantuṃ śīlam asyeti tena paramaṃ niratiśayaṃ puruṣaṃ pūrṇaṃ divyaṃ divi dyotanātmany
GE07bhg4c08u:317: āditye bhavaṃ yaś cāsāv āditye iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:321: viśvanāthaḥ --- tasmāt smaraṇābhyāsina evānta-kāle svata eva mat-smaraṇaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c08u:322: tena ca māṃ prāpnotīty ataś cetaso mat-smaraṇam eva paramo yoga ity āha abhyāsa-yoga iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:323: abhyāso mat-smaraṇasya punaḥ punar āvṛttir eva yogas tad-yuktena cetasā,
GE07bhg4c08u:324: ataeva nānyaṃ viṣayaṃ gantuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tena /
GE07bhg4c08u:326: baladevaḥ - sārvadikī smṛtir evāntima-smṛtikarīty evaṃ draḍhayati abhyāsenti /
GE07bhg4c08u:328: tato 'nyatrācalatā tad ekāgreṇa cetasā divyaṃ puruṣaṃ paramaṃ sa-śrīkaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ vāsudevam anucintayan tam eva kīṭa-bhṛṅga-nyāyena tat-tulāḥ san yāti labhate //8//
GE07bhg4c08u:334: śrīdharaḥ - punar apy anucintanīyaṃ puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi kavim iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c08u:337: aṇoḥ sūkṣmād apy aṇīyāṃsaṃ atisūkṣmam ākāśa-kāla-digbhyo 'py atisūkṣmataram /
GE07bhg4c08u:340: vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam āditya-varṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt iti śruteḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c08u:341: madhusūdanaḥ - punar api tam evānucintayitavyaṃ gantavyaṃ ca puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi kavim iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:343: purāṇaṃ cirantanaṃ sarva-kāraṇatvād anādim iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c08u:345: aṇor aṇīyāṃsaṃ sūkṣād apy ākāśādeḥ sūkṣmataraṃ tad-upādānatvāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:346: sarvasya karma-phala-jātasya dhātāraṃ vicitratayā prāṇibhyo vibhaktāraṃ phalam ata upapatteḥ iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:347: na cintayituṃ śakyam aparimitam ahimatvena rūpaṃ yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c08u:348: ādityasyeva sakala-jagad-avabhāsako varṇaḥ prakāśo yasya taṃ sarvasya jagato 'vabhāsakam iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c08u:349: ataeva tamasaḥ parastāt tamaso mohāndhakārād ajñāna-lakṣaṇāt parastāt prakāśa-rūpatvena tamo-virodhinam iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c08u:350: anusmarec cintayed yaḥ kaścid api sa taṃ yātīti pūrveṇaiva
GE07bhg4c08u:352: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam iti pareṇa vā sambandhaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c08u:353: viśvanāthaḥ --- yogābhyāsaṃ vinā manaso viṣaya-grāmān nivṛttir durghaṭā /
GE07bhg4c08u:354: yac ca vinā sātatyena bhagavat-smaraṇam api durghaṭam iti yuktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:355: kenacit yogābhyāsena sahitaiva bhaktiḥ kriyata iti tāṃ yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim āha kavim iti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:356: kaviṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvajño 'py anyaḥ sanakādiḥ sārvakāliko na bhavaty ata āha purāṇam anādiṃ sarvajño 'nādir apy antaryāmī sa bhakty-upadeṣṭā na bhavaty ata āha anuśāsitāram /
GE07bhg4c08u:358: tādṛśa-kṛpālur api sudurvijñeya-tattva eva ity āha aṇoḥ sakāśād apy aṇīyāṃsam /
GE07bhg4c08u:359: tarhi sa kiṃ jīva iva paramāṇu-pramāṇas tatrāha sarvasya dhātāraṃ sarva-vastu-mātra-dhārakatvena sarva-vyāpakatvāt paraṃ mahā-parimāṇam apīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:362: madhyama-parimāṇam api tasyānanya-prakāśyatvam āha āditya-varṇam ādityavat sva-para-prakāśako varṇaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya /
GE07bhg4c08u:363: tathā tamasaḥ prakṛteḥ parastāt vartamānaṃ māyā-śaktimantam api māyātīta-svarūpam ity arthaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c08u:364: baladevaḥ - yogād ṛte cetaso 'nanya-gāmitā duṣkareti yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim āha kavim ity ādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:367: aṇor aṇīyāṃsaṃ tena cāṇum api jīvam antaḥ praviśatīti siddham /
GE07bhg4c08u:368: āha caivaṃ śrutiḥ antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:371: nanu katham evaṃ saṅgacchate tatrāha acintya-rūpaṃ avitarkya-svarūpaṃ ekam eva brahma puruṣa-vidhatvena madhyama-parimāṇam aṇor aṇīyāṃsam ity ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:375: sva-parakāśatām āha ādityeti sūryavat sva-para-prakāśakam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:379: etādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'nukṣaṇaṃ smaret sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti iti pareṇānvayaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c08u:384: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam //10//
GE07bhg4c08u:387: evaṃbhūtaṃ puruṣam anta-kāle bhakti-yukto niścalena vikṣepa-rahitena manasā yo 'nusmaret /
GE07bhg4c08u:389: yoga-balena samyak suṣumṇā mārgeṇa bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśyeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:390: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣaṃ paramātma-svarūpaṃ divyaṃ dyotanātmakaṃ prāpnoti //10//
GE07bhg4c08u:391: madhusūdanaḥ - kadā tad-anusmaraṇe pratrātireko 'bhyavartate tad āha prayāneti /
GE07bhg4c08u:392: prayāṇa-kāle 'nta-kāle 'calenaikāgreṇa manasā taṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'nusmared ity anuvartate /
GE07bhg4c08u:393: kīdṛśaḥ bhaktyā parameśvara-viṣayeṇa parameṇa premṇā yuktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:394: yogasya samādher balena taj-janita-saṃskāra-samūhena vyutthāna-saṃskāra-virodhinā ca yuktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:395: evaṃ prathamaṃ hṛdaya-puṇḍarīke vaśīkṛtya tata ūrdhva-gāminyā suṣumṇayā nāḍyā gurūpadiṣṭa-mārgeṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:396: bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa bhruvor madhye ājñā-cakre prāṇam āveśya sthāpayitvā samyag apramatto
GE07bhg4c08u:397: brahma-randhrād utkrāmya sa evam upāsakas taṃ kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram ity-ādi-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:398: paraṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ dyotanātmakam upaiti pratipadyate //10 //
GE07bhg4c08u:399: viśvanāthaḥ --- prayāṇa-kāle 'nta-kāle 'calena niścalena manasā yā satata-smaraṇa-mayī bhaktis tayā yuktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:403: baladevaḥ -- yo jano bhaktyā paramātma-premṇā yoga-balena samādhi-janita-saṃskāra-nicayena ca yuktaḥ prayāṇa-kāle maraṇa-samaye 'calenaikāgreṇa manasā taṃ puruṣam anusmaret /
GE07bhg4c08u:405: bhruvor madhye ājñā-cakre prāṇam āveśya saṃsthāpya samyak sāvadhānaḥ san sa taṃ puruṣam upaiti //10//
GE07bhg4c08u:411: śrīdharaḥ - kevalād abhyāsa-yogād api praṇavā̆bhyāsam antaraṅgaṃ vidhitsuḥ pratijānīte-yad akṣaram iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:413: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhata iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:416: yac ca jñātum icchanto gurukule brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
GE07bhg4c08u:417: tat te tubhyaṃ padaṃ padyate gamyata iti padaṃ prāpyam /
GE07bhg4c08u:420: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīṃ yena kenacid abhidhānena dhyāna-kāle bhagavad-anusmaraṇe prāpte-
GE07bhg4c08u:424: tatte padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmy om ity etat // (KaṭhaU 1.2.15)
GE07bhg4c08u:425: ity ādi-śruti-pratipāditatvena praṇavenaivābhidhānena tad-anusmaraṇaṃ kartavyaṃ nānyena mantrādineti niyantum upakramate yad akṣaram iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:426: yad akṣaram avināśi oṅkārākhyaṃ brahma veda-vido vadanti etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi
GE07bhg4c08u:427: brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam aṇv ahrasvam adīrgham ity ādi-vacanaiḥ sarva-viśeṣa-nivartanena pratipādayanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:428: pramāṇa-kuśalair eva pratipannaṃ kiṃ tu muktopasṛpyatayā tair apy anubhūtam ity āha-viśanti
GE07bhg4c08u:429: svarūpatayā samyag-darśanena yad akṣaraṃ yatayo yatna-śīlāḥ saṃnyāsino vīta-rāgā niḥspṛhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:430: na kevalaṃ siddhair anubhūtaṃ sādhakānām api sarvo 'pi prayāsas tad-artha ity āha
GE07bhg4c08u:431: yad-icchanto jñātuṃ naiṣṭhikā brahmacāriṇo brahmacaryaṃ gurukula-vāsādi-tapaś caranti
GE07bhg4c08u:432: yāvaj-jīvaṃ tad akṣarākhyaṃ padaṃ padanīyaṃ te tubhyaṃ saṅgraheṇa saṅkṣepeṇāhaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:433: pravakṣye prakarṣeṇa kathayiṣyāmi yathā tava bodho bhavati tathā /
GE07bhg4c08u:434: atas tad akṣaraṃ kathaṃ mayā jñeyam ity ākulo mā bhūr ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:435: atra ca parasya brahmaṇo vācaka-rūpeṇa pratimāvat-pratīka-rūpeṇa ca yaḥ punar etaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:436: trimātreṇom ity aneaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣam abhidhyāyīta sa tam adhigacchati ity
GE07bhg4c08u:437: ādi-vacanair manda-madhyama-buddhīnāṃ krama-mukti-phalakam upāsanam uktaṃ tad evehāpi
GE07bhg4c08u:439: ato yoga-dhāraṇā-sahitam oṅkāropāsanaṃ tat phalaṃ sva-svarūpaṃ tato 'punar-āvṛttis tan-mārgaś cety artha-jātam ucyate yāvad adhyāya-samāpti
GE07bhg4c08u:440: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya ity etāvan mātroktyā yogo na jñāyate,
GE07bhg4c08u:444: kiṃ vā prāpyam ity api saṅkṣepeṇa brūhīty apekṣāyām āha yad iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:445: yad evākṣaram om ity ekākṣara-vācyaṃ brahma yatayo viśanti tat padaṃ padyate gamyata iti padaṃ prāpyam /
GE07bhg4c08u:446: samyaktayā gṛhayte 'neneti saṅgrahas tad-upāyas tena saha pravakṣye śṛṇu //11//
GE07bhg4c08u:447: baladevaḥ -- nanu bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśyaitāvatā yogo nāvagamyate,
GE07bhg4c08u:448: tasmāt tasya prakāraṃ tatra japyaṃ prāpyaṃ brūhīty apekṣāyām āha yad akṣaram iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:449: ekam eva brahma akṣaram om iti vācakaṃ vadanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:450: vīta-rāgā vinaṣṭāvidyā yatayo yad brahma tad-vācya-bhūtaṃ vijñānaika-rasaṃ viśanti prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:451: tad-ubhaya-r”paṃ brahma jñātum icchanto naiṣṭhikā gurukula-vasādi-lakṣaṇaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
GE07bhg4c08u:452: tat padaṃ prāpyaṃ saṅgraheṇopāyena saha pravakṣye vakṣyāmi yathānāyasena tvaṃ tad-vidyāṃ prāpnuyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:453: samyag gṛhyate tattvam anena iti nirukteḥ saṅgraha upāyaḥ //11//
GE07bhg4c08u:455: sarva-dvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca /
GE07bhg4c08u:457: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran /
GE07bhg4c08u:458: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim //13//
GE07bhg4c08u:459: śrīdharaḥ - pratijñātam upāyaṃ sāṅgam āha dvābhyāṃ sarveti /
GE07bhg4c08u:464: mūrdhni bhruvor madhye prāṇam ādhāya yogasya dhāraṇāṃ sthairyam āsthitaḥ āśritavān san //12//
GE07bhg4c08u:465: om iti / om ity ekaṃ yad akṣaraṃ tad eva brahma-vācakatvād vā pratimādivad brahma-pratīkatvād vā brahma /
GE07bhg4c08u:466: tad-vyāharan uccārayaṃs tad-vācyaṃ ca mām anusmarann eva dehaṃ tyajan yaḥ prakarṣeṇa yāti arcirādi-mārgeṇa sa paramāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ gatiṃ mad-gatiṃ yāti prāpnoti //13//
GE07bhg4c08u:467: madhusūdanaḥ - tatra pravakṣya iti pratijñātam arthaṃ sopakaraṇam āhaa dvābhyām sarva-dvārāṇīti /
GE07bhg4c08u:468: sarvāṇīndriya-dvārāṇi saṃyamya sva-sva-viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya viṣaya-doṣa-darśanābhyāsāt tad-vimukhatām āpāditaiḥ śrotrādibhiḥ śabdādi-viṣaya-grahaṇam akurvan /
GE07bhg4c08u:469: bāheyndriya-nirodhe 'pi manasaḥ pracāraḥ syād ity ata āha mano hṛdi nirudhya ca,
GE07bhg4c08u:470: abhyāsa-vairāgyābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭhe vyākhyātābhyāṃ hṛdaya-deśe mano nirudhya nirvṛttikatām āpādya ca,
GE07bhg4c08u:471: antar api viṣaya-cintām akurvann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:472: evaṃ bahir antar upalabdhi-dvārāṇi sarvāṇi saṃnirudhya kriyā-dvāraṃ prāṇam api sarvato
GE07bhg4c08u:473: nigṛhya bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa mūrdhny ādhāya bhruvor madhye tad-upari ca gurūpadiṣṭa-mārgeṇāveśyātmano
GE07bhg4c08u:476: om ity ekam akṣaraṃ brahma-vācakatvāt pratimā-baddha-brahma-pratīkatvād vā brahma vyāharann uccaran /
GE07bhg4c08u:477: om iti vyāharann ity etāvataiva nirvāha ekākṣaram ity anāyāsa-kathanena stuty-artham /
GE07bhg4c08u:478: om iti vyāharann ekākṣaram ekam advitīyam akṣaram avināśi sarva-vyāpakaṃ brahma mām om ity asyārthaṃ smarann iti vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:479: tena praṇavaṃ japaṃs tad-abhidheya-bhūtaṃ ca māṃ cintayan mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā dehaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:480: tyajanyaḥ prayāti sa yāti deva-yāna-mārgeṇa brahma-lokaṃ gatvā tad-bhogānte paramāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:483: samādhi-lābhaḥ ity uktvā īśvara-praṇidhānād vā (1.23) ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:484: praṇidhānaṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ (1.27)
GE07bhg4c08u:487: iha tu sākṣād eva tataḥ parama-gati-lābha ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:488: tasmād avirodhayom ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmarann ātmano yoga-dhāraṇām āsthita iti vyākhyeyam /
GE07bhg4c08u:490: viśvanāthaḥ --- uktam arthaṃ vadan yoge prakāram āha sarvāṇi cakṣur-ādīndriya-dvārāṇi
GE07bhg4c08u:491: saṃyamya bāhya-viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya manaś ca hṛdy eva nirudhya viṣayāntareṣv asaṅkalpya
GE07bhg4c08u:492: mūrdhni bhruvor madhye eva prāṇam ādhāya yoga-dhāraṇām ānakha-śikha-man-mūrti-bhāvanām
GE07bhg4c08u:493: āśritaḥ san om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma-svarūpaṃ vyāharan uccārayan tad-vācyaṃ mām anusmarann
GE07bhg4c08u:496: sarvāṇi bahir jñāna-dvārāṇi śrotrādīni saṃyamya śabdādibhyo viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya
GE07bhg4c08u:497: doṣa-darśanābhyāsena tad-vimukhais tais tān gṛhṇan śrotrādi-saṃyame 'pi manaḥ pracared
GE07bhg4c08u:498: ity ata āha hṛdi sthite mayi antar-jñāna-dvāraṃ mano nirudhya niveśya manasāpi tān smaran /
GE07bhg4c08u:499: atha kriyā-dvāraṃ prāṇaṃ ca mūrdhnādhāyādau hṛt-padme vaśīkṛtya tasmād ūrdhva-gatayā
GE07bhg4c08u:500: suṣumṇayā gurūpadiṣṭa-vartmanā bhūmi-jaya-krameṇa bhruvor madhye tad-upari brahma-randhre
GE07bhg4c08u:501: ca saṃsthāpya ātmano mama yoga-dhāraṇām āāda-śikhaṃ mad-bhāvanam āsthitaḥ kurvan /
GE07bhg4c08u:502: om iti vācakaṃ brahma tatra vyāharan antar uccārayan tat stauti ekākṣaram iti ekaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:503: pradhānaṃ ca tad-akṣaram avināśi ceti tathā tad vācyaṃ māṃ parmātmānam anusmaran
GE07bhg4c08u:504: dhyāyan yo dehaṃ tyajan prayāti sa paramāṃ gatiṃ mat-sālokyatāṃ yāti //12-13 //
GE07bhg4c08u:506: ananya-cetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:508: śrīdharaḥ - evaṃ cānta-kāle dhāraṇayā mat-prāptir nityābhyāsavata eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c08u:512: yo māṃ satataṃ nirantaraṃ nityaśaḥ pratidinaṃ smarati /
GE07bhg4c08u:513: tasya nitya-yuktasya samāhitasyāhaṃ sukhena labhyo 'smi nānyasya //14//
GE07bhg4c08u:514: madhusūdanaḥ - ya evaṃ vāyu-nirodha-vaidhuryeṇa prāṇam āveśya mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā dehaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:515: tyaktuṃ svecchayā na śaknoti kiṃ tu karma-kṣayeṇaiva paravaśo dehaṃ tyajati tasya
GE07bhg4c08u:516: kiṃ syād iti tad āha ananya-cetā iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:517: na vidyate mad-anya-viṣaye ceto yasya so 'nanya-cetāḥ satataṃ nirantaraṃ nityaśo
GE07bhg4c08u:518: yāvaj-jīvaṃ yo māṃ smarati tasya sva-vaśatayā vā dehaṃ tyajato 'pi nitya-yuktasya
GE07bhg4c08u:519: satata-samāhita-cittasya yoginaḥ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyo 'haṃ parameśvara itareṣām
GE07bhg4c08u:520: atidurlabho 'pi he pārtha tavāham atisulabho mā bhaiṣīr ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:524: satatam iti nairantaryaṃ nityaśa iti dīrgha-kālatvaṃ smaraṇasyoktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:527: tatra sa ity abhyāsa ukto 'pi smaraṇa-paryavasāyī /
GE07bhg4c08u:528: tena yāvaj-jīvaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikṣepāntara-śūnyatayā bhagavad-anucintanam eva parama-gati-hetur mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā tu svecchayā prāṇotkramaṇaṃ bhavatu na veti nātīvāgrahaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c08u:529: viśvanāthaḥ --- tad evam ārtaḥ ity ādinā karma-miśrām,
GE07bhg4c08u:531: kaviṃ purāṇaṃ ity ādibhir yoga-miśrāṃ ca saparikarāṃ pradhānībhūtāṃ bhaktim uktvā sarva-śreṣṭhāṃ nirguṇāṃ kevalāṃ bhaktim āha-ananya-cetā iti
GE07bhg4c08u:534: tathā svargāpargādāv api prāpyatvena ceto yasya /
GE07bhg4c08u:535: satataṃ sadeti kāla-deśa-pātra-śuddhy-ādy-anapekṣatayaiva nityaśaḥ pratidinam eva yo māṃ smarati,
GE07bhg4c08u:536: yasya tena bhaktenāhaṃ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:538: nitya-yuktasya nitya-mad-yogākāṅkṣiṇa āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavac ceti bhāviny api yoga āśāṃsite kta-pratyayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:542: baladevaḥ - evaṃ mokṣa-mātra-kāṅkṣiṇāṃ yoga-miśrāṃ bhaktim upadiśya sva-jñānināṃ svam evākāṅkṣatām eka-bhaktir ity uktāṃ śuddhāṃ bhaktiṃ upadiśati ananyeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:543: yo jano 'nanya-cetā na matto 'nyasmin karma-yogādike sādhane svarga-mokṣādike sādhye
GE07bhg4c08u:544: vā ceto yasya sa mad-ekābhilāṣavān satataṃ sarvadā deśa-kālādi-viśuddhi-nairapekṣeṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:545: nityaśaḥ pratyahaṃ māṃ yaśodā-stanandhayaṃ nṛsiṃha-raghunāthādi-rūpeṇa bahudhāvirbhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:546: sarveśvaram atimātra-priyaṃ smaraty arcana-japādiṣv anusandhatte tasyāhaṃ tat-prītijñaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:549: na lokāvyaya ity ādinā kartari tasyāḥ pratiṣedhāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:550: tādṛśasya tasya viyogam asahiṣṇur aham eva tam ātmānaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:552: śrutiś caivam āha - yam evaiṣa vṛnute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā viviṛṇute tanūṃ svām iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:553: svayaṃ ca vakṣyati - dadāmi buddhi-yogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c08u:555: sarvadā mad-yogaṃ vāñchataḥ āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavac ca iti sūtrād āśāṃsite yoge bhaviṣyaty api kta-pratyayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:558: mām upetya punar janma duḥkhālayam aśāśvatam /
GE07bhg4c08u:560: śrīdharaḥ - yady evaṃ tvaṃ sulabho 'si tataḥ kiṃ ?
GE07bhg4c08u:562: ukta-lakṣaṇā mahātmāno mad-bhaktā māṃ prāpya punar duḥkhāśrayam antiyaṃ ca janma na prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:563: yatas te paramāṃ samyak siddhiṃ mokṣam eva prāptāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:564: punar janmano duḥkhānāṃ cālayaṃ sthānaṃ te mām upetya na prāpnuvantīti vā //15//
GE07bhg4c08u:565: madhusūdanaḥ - bhagavantaṃ prāptāḥ punar āvartante na veti sandehe nāvartanta ity āha mām iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:566: mām īśvaraṃ prāpya punar janma manuṣyādi-deha-sambandhaṃ kīdṛśaṃ duḥkhālayaṃ garbha-vāsa-yoni-dvāra-nirgamanādy-aneka-duḥkha-sthānam /
GE07bhg4c08u:567: aśāśvatam asthiraṃ dṛṣṭa-naṣṭa-prāyaṃ nāpnuvanti punar nāvartanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:568: yato mahātmnāno rajas-tamo-mala-rahitāntaḥ-karaṇā śuddha-sattvāḥ samutpanna-samyag-darśanā mal-loka-bhogānte paramāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ muktiṃ gatās te /
GE07bhg4c08u:569: atra māṃ prāpya siddhiṃ gatā iti vadatopāsakānāṃ krama-muktir darśitā //15//
GE07bhg4c08u:570: viśvanāthaḥ --- tvāṃ prāptavatas tasya kiṃ syād ity āha mām iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:572: aśāśvatam anityaṃ ca janma nāpnuvanti kintu sukha-pūrṇaṃ janma maj-janma-tulyaṃ prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:573: śāśvatas tu dhruvo nityaḥ sadānanaḥ sanātanaḥ ity amaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:574: yadā vasudeva-gṛhe sukha-pūrṇaṃ nitya-bhūtam aprākṛtaṃ maj-janma bhavet tad eva teṣāṃ mad-bhaktānām api man-nitya-saṅgināṃ janma syān nānyadā iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:575: paramām iti anye bhaktāḥ saṃsiddhiṃ prāpnuvanti ananya-cetasas tu paramāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ mal-līlā-parikaratām ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:577: baladevaḥ -- tāṃ labdhavataḥ kiṃ phalaṃ syād ity apekṣāyām āha mām iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:578: mām ukta-lakṣaṇam upetya prāpya punaḥ prapañce janma nāpnuvanti nāvartanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:580: aśāśvatam anityaṃ dṛṣṭa-naṣṭa-prāyam śāśvatas tu dhruvo nityaḥ ity amaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:581: yatas te paramāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭāṃ saṃsiddhiṃ gatiṃ mām eva gatā labdhavantaḥ avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim iti vakṣyati /
GE07bhg4c08u:583: bhaktāyatta-sarvasvaṃ māṃ vinānyat sārṣṭyādikam agaṇayanto made-eka-jīvātavo bhavanty
GE07bhg4c08u:584: atas te mām eva saṃsiddhiṃ gatāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:589: mām upetya tu kaunteya punar-janma na vidyate //16//
GE07bhg4c08u:590: śrīdharaḥ - sarva eva jīvā mahā-sukṛtino 'pi jāyante /
GE07bhg4c08u:591: mad-bhaktās tu tadvan na jāyanta ity āha ā-brahmeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:593: madhusūdanaḥ - bhagavantam upāgatānāṃ samyag-darśinām apunar-āvṛttau kathitāyāṃ tato vimukhānām asamyag-darśināṃ punar-āvṛttir artha-siddhety āha ābrahmeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:594: ābrahma-bhuvanāt bhavanty atra bhūtānīti bhuvanaṃ lokaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:596: brahma-lokena saha sarve 'pi lokā mad-vimukhānām asamyag-darśināṃ bhoga-bhūtayaḥ punar-āvartinaḥ punar-āvartana-śīlāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:597: brahma-bhavanād iti pāṭhe bhavanaṃ vāsa-sthānam iti sa evārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:599: kiṃ tadvad eva tvāṃ prāptānām api punar āvṛttir nety āha mām īśvaram ekam upetya tu /
GE07bhg4c08u:601: mām eva prāpya nirvṛttānāṃ he kaunteya mātṛto 'pi prasiddha-mahānubhāva punar-janma na vidyate punar-āvṛttir nāstīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:602: atrārjuna kaunteyeti sambodhana-dvayena svarūpataḥ kāraṇataś ca śuddhir jñāna-saṃpattaye sūcitā /
GE07bhg4c08u:604: ye krama-mukti-phalābhirupāsanābhir brahma-lokaṃ prāptās teṣām eva tatrotpanna-samyag-darśanānāṃ brahmaṇā saha mokṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:605: ye tu pañcāgni-vidyādibhir atat-kratavo 'pi tatra gatās teṣām avaśyambhāvi punar-janma /
GE07bhg4c08u:606: ataeva krama-mukty-abhiprāyeṇa brahma-lokam abhisampadyate na ca punar āvartate,
GE07bhg4c08u:608: itaratra teṣām iha na punar āvṛttiḥ imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante itīhemam iti ca viśeṣaṇād gamanādhikaraṇa-kalpād anyatra punar āvṛttiḥ pratīyate
GE07bhg4c08u:609: viśvanāthaḥ --- sarva eva jīvā mahā-sukṛtino 'pi jāyante mad-bhaktās tu tavan na jāyanta ity āha ābrahmeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:611: baladevaḥ - mad-vimukhās tu karma-viśeṣaiḥ svargādi-lokān prāptā api tebhyaḥ patantīty āha ābrahmeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:613: brahma-lokena saha sarve svargādayo lokās tat-tad-vartino jīvās tat-tat-karma-kṣaye sati punar āvartino bhūmau punar janma labhante /
GE07bhg4c08u:615: atredaṃ bodhyaṃ pañcāgni-vidyayā mahāhava-maraṇādinā ye brahma-lokaṃ gatās teṣāṃ bhogānte pātaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:616: ye tu sa-niṣṭhāḥ pareśa-bhaktāḥ svargādi-lokān krameṇānubhavantas tatra gatās teṣāṃ tu na tasmāt pātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:617: kintu tal-loka-vināśe tat-patinā saha pareśa-loka-prāptir eva -
GE07bhg4c08u:618: brahmaṇā saha te sarve samprāpte pratisañcare /
GE07bhg4c08u:624: śrīdharaḥ - nanu ca tapasvino dāna-śīlā vīta-rāgās titikṣavaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:626: ity ādi purāṇa-vākyais trailokyasya sakāśān maharlokādīnām utkṛṣṭatvaṃ gamyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:627: vināśitve ca sarveṣām avaśiṣṭe katham asau viśeṣaḥ syād ity āśaṅkya bahv-alpa-kāla-sthāyitva-nimitto
GE07bhg4c08u:628: 'sau viśeṣa ity āśayena sva-mānena śata-varṣāyuṣo brahmaṇo 'hany ahani trilokya utpattiḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:629: niśi niśi ca pralayo bhavatīti darśayiṣyan brahmaṇo 'horātrayoḥ pramāṇam āha sahasreti /
GE07bhg4c08u:630: sahasraṃ yugāni paryanto 'vasānaṃ ysya tad brahmaṇo yad ahas tad ye viduḥ yuga-sahasram anto yasyās tāṃ rātriṃ ca yoga-balena ye vidus ta eva sarvajñā janā aho-rātra-vidaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:631: yeṣāṃ tu kevalaṃ candrāditya-gatyaiva jñānaṃ te tathāhorātra-vido na bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:633: yuga-śabdena atra caturyugam abhipretaṃ caturyuga-sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinam ucyate iti viṣṇu-purāṇokteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:636: manuṣyāṇāṃ yad varṣaṃ tad devānām aho-rātram /
GE07bhg4c08u:637: tādṛśair aho-rātraiḥ pakṣa-māsādi-kalpanayā dvādaśabhir varṣa-sahasraiś catur-yugaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c08u:639: tāvat parimāṇaiva rātris tādṛśair aho-rātraiḥ pakṣa-māsādi-krameṇa varṣa-śataṃa brahmaṇaḥ paramāyur iti //17//
GE07bhg4c08u:640: madhusūdanaḥ - brahma-loka-sahitāḥ sarve lokāḥ punar āvartinaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:642: manuṣya-parimāṇena sahasra-yuga-paryantaṃ sahasraṃ yugāni catur-yugāni paryanto 'vasānaṃ yasya tat /
GE07bhg4c08u:643: caturyuga-sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinam ucyate iti hi paurāṇikaṃ vacanam /
GE07bhg4c08u:644: tādṛśaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prajāpater ahar-dinaṃ yad ye viduḥ tathā rātriṃ yuga-sahasrāntāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:645: caturyuga-sahasra-paryantāṃ ye vidur ity anuvartate te 'horātra-vidas ta evāho-rātra-vido yogino janāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:646: ye tu candrārka-gatyaiva vidus te nāhorātra-vidaḥ svalpa-darśitvād ity abhiprāyaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c08u:647: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu amṛtaṃ kṣemam abhayaṃ trimūrdhno 'dhāyi mūrdhasu (BhP 2.6.19)
GE07bhg4c08u:648: iti dvitīya-skandhoktyā keṣāṃcin mate brahma-lokasya abhayatva-śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:649: sannyāsibhir api jagamiṣitatvāt tatratyānāṃ pāto na sambhāvyate ? maivaṃ /
GE07bhg4c08u:650: tal-loka-svāmino brahmaṇo 'pi pātaḥ syāt kim utānyeṣām iti vyañjayann āha sahasra iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:651: sahasraṃ yugāni paryanto 'vasānaṃ yasya tad brahmaṇo 'har dinaṃ yad ye śāstrābhijñā vidur jānanti te 'ho-rātra-vido janā rātrim api tasya yuga-sahasrāntāṃ viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:652: tena tādṛśāho-rātraiḥ pakṣam āsādi-krameṇa varṣa-śataṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramāyur iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:653: etad-ante tasyāpi pāto na kasyacid vaiṣṇavasya tasya brahmaṇo mokṣaś ceti vyañjitam //17//
GE07bhg4c08u:654: baladevaḥ - svargādayaḥ satyāntāḥ sarve lokāḥ kāla-paricchinnatvād vinaśyantīti bhāvenāha sahasreti /
GE07bhg4c08u:655: yad ye brahmaṇaś caturmukhasyāhar dinaṃ nṛ-māṇena sahasra-yuga-paryantaṃ viduḥ catur-yuga-sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinam ucyate iti smṛteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:657: tasya rātriṃ ca caturyuga-sahasrāntāṃ vidus ta eva yogino janā aho-rātra-vido bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:658: na tv anye candrārka-gati-vido mahar-lokādi-sthitānām upalakṣaṇam etat /
GE07bhg4c08u:659: ayam arthaḥ nṝṇāṃ varṣaṃ devānām aho-rātraṃ tādṛśair aho-rātraiḥ pakṣam āsādi-gaṇanayā
GE07bhg4c08u:660: dvādaśabhri varṣa-sahasraiś catur-yugaṃ catur-yugānāṃ sahasraṃ tu brahmaṇo dinaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:661: rātriś ca tāvaty eva tādṛśaiś cāho-rātraiḥ pakṣādi-gaṇanayā varṣa-śataṃ tasya paramāyur iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:670: tasmād avyaktāt kāraṇa-rūpād vyajyanta iti vyaktayaś carācarāṇi bhūtāni prādurbhavanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:674: yad vā te 'horātra-vida ity etan na vidhīyante /
GE07bhg4c08u:675: kintu te prasiddhā ahorātra-vido janā brahmaṇo yad ahar vidus tasyāhna āgame 'vyaktād vyaktayaḥ prabhavanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:676: yāṃ ca rātriṃ vidus tasyā rātrer āgame pralīyante iti dvayor anvayaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c08u:677: madhusūdanaḥ - yathoktair aho-rātraiḥ pakṣam āsādi-gaṇanayā pūrṇaṃ varṣa-śataṃ prajāpateḥ paramāyur iti kāla-paricchinnatvenānityo 'sau /
GE07bhg4c08u:679: ye tu tato 'rvācīnās teṣāṃ tad ahar-mātra-paricchinnatvāt tat-tal-lokebhyaḥ punar-āvṛttir iti kim u vaktavyam ity āha avyaktād iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:680: atra dainandina-sṛṣṭi-pralayor eva vaktum upakrāntatvāt tatra cākāśādīnāṃ sattvād avyakta-śabdenākhyākṛtāvasthā nocyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:683: ahar-āgame prajāpateḥ prabodha-samaye 'vyaktāt tat-svāpāvasthā-rūpād vyaktayaḥ śarīra-viṣayādi-rūpā bhoga-bhūtayaḥ prabhavanti vyavahāra-kṣamatayā 'bhivyajyante /
GE07bhg4c08u:684: rātry-āgame tasya svāpa-kāle pūrvoktāḥ sarvā api vyaktayaḥ pralīyante tiro-bhavanti yata āvirbhūtās tatraivāvyakta-saṃjñake
GE07bhg4c08u:686: viśvanāthaḥ --- ye tu tato 'rvācīnās triloka-sthās teṣāṃ tu tasyāhany ahany api pāta ity āha avyaktād iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:687: atra dainandina-sṛṣṭi-pralayayor ākāśādīnāṃ sattvād avyakta-śabdena svāpāvasthaḥ prajāpatir evocyate iti madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:688: tataś ca avyaktāt svāpāvasthāt prajāpateḥ sakāśād vyaktayaḥ śarīra-viṣayādi-rūpā bhoga-bhūmayo bhavanti vyavahāra-kṣamāḥ syuḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:689: rātry-āgame tasya svāpa-kāle pralīyante tasminn eva tirobhavanti //18//
GE07bhg4c08u:690: baladevaḥ -- ye tu tasmād arvācīnās trilokī-vartinas teṣāṃ brahmaṇo dine pātaḥ syād ity āha avyaktād iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:691: ahar-āgame brahmaṇo jāgara-samaye avyaktāt svāpāvasthāt tasmāt sarvā śarīrendriya-bhogya-bhoga-sthāna-rūpā vyaktayaḥ prabhavanty utpadyante
GE07bhg4c08u:692: rātry-āgame tasya svāpa-samaye tatraiva brahmaṇy avyakta-saṃjñake svāpāvasthe kāraṇe tāḥ pralīyante tirobhavanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:697: bhūta-grāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:699: śrīdharaḥ - atra ca kṛta-nāśākṛtābhyāgama-śaṅkāṃ vārayan vairāgyārthaṃ sṛṣṭi-praylaya-pravāhasyāvicchedaṃ darśayati bhūta-grāma iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:702: yaḥ prāg āsīt sa evāyam ahar-āgame bhūtvā bhūtvā rātrer āgame pralīyante pralīya pralīya punar apy ahar-āgame 'vaśaḥ karmādi-paratantraḥ san prabhavati nānya ity arthaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c08u:703: madhusūdanaḥ - evam āśu-vināśitve 'pi saṃsāra-stha na nivṛttiḥ kleśa-karmādibhir avaśatayā punaḥ punaḥ prādurbhāvāt prādurbhūtasya ca punaḥ kleśādi-vaśenaiva tirobhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:704: saṃsāre viparivartamānānāṃ sarveṣām api prāṇinām asvātantryād avaśānām eva janma-maraṇādi-duḥkha-prabandha-sambandhād
GE07bhg4c08u:705: alam anena saṃsāreṇeti-vairāgyotpatty-arthaṃ samāna-nāma-rūpatvena ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:707: bhūta-grāmo bhūta-samudāyaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgama-lakṣaṇo yaḥ pūrvasmin kalpe sthitaḥ sa evāyam etasmin kalpe jāyamāno 'pi na tu pratikalpam anyo 'nyac ca /
GE07bhg4c08u:710: divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣam atho suvaḥ //
GE07bhg4c08u:713: samāna-nāma-rūpatvād āvṛttāv apy avirodhau darśanāt smṛteś ca (Vs 1.3.30)
GE07bhg4c08u:717: viśvanāthaḥ --- evam eva bhūtānāṃ carācara-prāṇināṃ grāmaḥ samūhaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c08u:718: baladevaḥ - ye pralīnās te punar na bhaviṣyantīti kṛta-hānyākṛtābhyāgama-śaṅkā syāt tāṃ nirasyann āha bhūteti /
GE07bhg4c08u:719: bhūta-grāmaḥ sthira-cara-prāṇi-samūho 'vaśaḥ karmādhīnaḥ san tathā cedṛśa-janma-mṛtyu-pravāha-saṅkule prapañce 'smin vivekināṃ vairāgyaṃ yuktam ity uktam //19//
GE07bhg4c08u:722: yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati //20//
GE07bhg4c08u:723: śrīdharaḥ - lokānām anityatvaṃ prapañcya parameśvara-svarūpasya nityatvaṃ prapañcayati - para iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c08u:724: tasmāc carācara-kāraṇa-bhūtād avyaktāt paras tasyāpi kāraṇa-bhūto yo 'nyas tad-vilakṣaṇo 'vyaktaś cakṣur-ādy-agocaro bhāvaḥ sanātano 'nādiḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:725: sa tu sarveṣu kārya-kāraṇa-lakṣaṇeṣu bhūteṣu naśyatv api na vinaśyati //20//
GE07bhg4c08u:727: āvartina ity etad vyākhyātam adhunā mām upetya punar janma na vidyata ity etad vyācaṣṭe
GE07bhg4c08u:729: tasmāc carācara-sthūla-prapañca-kāraṇa-bhūtād dhiraṇyagarbhākhyād avyaktāt paro vyatiriktaḥ śreṣṭho vā tasyāpi kāraṇa-bhūtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:730: vyatireke 'pi sālakṣaṇyaṃ syād iti nety āha-anyo 'tyanta-vilakṣaṇaḥ na tasya pratimā asti iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:731: avyakto rūpādi-hīnatayā cakṣur-ādy-agocaro bhāvaḥ kalpiteṣu sarveṣu kāryeṣu sad-rūpeṇānugataḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:733: tu-śabdo heyād anityād avyaktād upādeyatvaṃ ntiyasyāvyaktasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ sūcayati /
GE07bhg4c08u:734: etādṛśo yo bhāvaḥ sa hiraṇyagarbha iva sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsv api na vinaśyati utpadyamāneṣv api notpadyata ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:735: / hiraṇyagarbhasya tu kāryasya bhūtābhimānitvāt tad-utpatti-vināśābhyāṃ yuktāv evotpatti-vināśau na tu tad-anabhimānino 'kāryasya parameśvarasyeti bhāvaḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c08u:736: viśvanāthaḥ --- tasmād ukta-lakṣaṇād avyaktāt prajāpater hiraṇyagarbhāt sakāśāt paraḥ śreṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:737: hiraṇyagarbhasyāpi kāraṇabhūto yo 'nyaḥ khalv avyakto bhāvaḥ sanātano 'nādiḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c08u:738: baladevaḥ - tad evaṃ karma-tantrāṇāṃ janma-vināśa-darśanena ābrahma-bhuvanāt ity etad vivṛtam /
GE07bhg4c08u:739: atha mām upetyaitad vivṛṇoti paras tasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:740: tasmād utka-rūpād avyaktād brahmaṇo hiraṇyagarbhād anyo yo bhāvaḥ padārthaḥ paraḥ śreṣṭhas tato 'tyanta-vilakṣaṇas tasyopāsya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:743: prasāditas tu pratyakṣo 'pi bhavatīty uktaṃ prāk /
GE07bhg4c08u:745: sa khalu hiraṇyagarbha-paryanteṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu na vinaśyati //20//
GE07bhg4c08u:747: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim /
GE07bhg4c08u:748: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama //21//
GE07bhg4c08u:749: śrīdharaḥ - avināśe pramāṇaṃ darśayann āha avyakta iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:752: tathākṣarāt saṃbhavatīha viśvaṃ ity ādi-śrutiṣv akṣara ity uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:753: taṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ gamyaṃ puruṣārtham āhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:754: puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ ity-ādi-śrutayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:755: parama-gatitvam evāha yaṃ prāpya na nivartanta iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:759: ato 'ham eva paramā gatir ity arthaḥ //21//
GE07bhg4c08u:760: madhusūdanaḥ - yo bhāva ihāvyakta ity akṣara iti cokto 'nyatrāpi śrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca taṃ bhāvam āhuḥ śrutayaḥ smṛtayaś ca puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā paramā gatiḥ ity ādyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:762: yaṃ bhāvaṃ prāpya na punar nivartante saṃsārāya tad-dhāma svarūpaṃ mama viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c08u:763: mama dhāmeti rāhoḥ śira itivad bheda-kalpanayā ṣaṣṭhī /
GE07bhg4c08u:764: ato 'ham eva paramā gatir ity arthaḥ //21//
GE07bhg4c08u:765: viśvanāthaḥ --- pūrvokta-ślokoktam avyakta-śabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe avyakta iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:766: na kṣaratīty akṣaro nārāyaṇaḥ eko nārāyaṇa āsīn na brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:768: yad vā akṣaraḥ paraṃ dhāma brahmaiva mad-dhāma mat-tejo-rūpam //21//
GE07bhg4c08u:769: baladevaḥ -- yo bhāvo mayehāvyakta ity akṣara iti cocyate taṃ vedāntāḥ paramāṃ gatim āhuḥ puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā paramā gatiḥ ity ādau /
GE07bhg4c08u:770: yaṃ bhāvaṃ prāpyopetya janāḥ punar na nivartante janma nāpnuvanti sa bhāvo 'ham evety āha tad iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:771: tan mamaiva dhāma svarūpaṃ paramaṃ śrīmat ṣaṣṭhīyaṃ caitanyam ātmanaḥ svarūpam itivad avagantavyā //21//
GE07bhg4c08u:773: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā /
GE07bhg4c08u:774: yasyāntaḥ-sthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam //22//
GE07bhg4c08u:775: śrīdharaḥ - tat-prāptau ca bhaktir antaraṅgopāya ity uktam evety āha puruṣa iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:777: na vidyate 'nyaḥ śaraṇatvena yasyāṃ tayaikānta-bhaktyaiva labhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:779: paratvam evāha yasya kāraṇa-bhūtasyāntar-madhye bhūtāni sthitāni /
GE07bhg4c08u:780: yena ca kāraṇa-bhūtenedaṃ sarvaṃ jagat tataṃ vyāptam //22//
GE07bhg4c08u:781: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīm ananya-cetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ tasyāhaṃ sulabhaḥ iti prāg uktaṃ bhakti-yogam eva tat-prāpty-upāyam āha puruṣa sa iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:782: sa paro niratiśayaḥ puruṣaḥ paramātmāham evānanyayā na vidyate 'nyho viṣayo yasyāṃ tayā prema-lakṣaṇayā bhaktyaiva labhyo nānyathā /
GE07bhg4c08u:783: sa ka ity apekṣāyām āha yasya purusasyāntaḥ-sthāny antarvartīni bhūtāni sarvāṇi kāryāṇi kāraṇāntarvartitvāt kāryasya /
GE07bhg4c08u:784: ataeva yena puruṣeṇa sarvam idaṃ kārya-jātaṃ tataṃ vyāptam -
GE07bhg4c08u:785: yasmāt paraṃ nāparam asti kiṃcid yasmān nāṇīyo na jyāyo 'sti kaścit /
GE07bhg4c08u:786: vṛkṣa eva stabdho divi tisṭhaty ekas tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam /
GE07bhg4c08u:787: yat kiṃcit jagat sarvaṃ dṛśyate śrūyate 'pi vā /
GE07bhg4c08u:788: antar bahiś ca tat sarvaṃ vyāpya nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ //
GE07bhg4c08u:790: viśvanāthaḥ --- sa ca mad-aṃśaḥ paramaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:792: ataeva pūrvaṃ mayoktaṃ ananya-cetāḥ satatam iti bhāvaḥ //22//
GE07bhg4c08u:793: baladevaḥ -- at-prāptau bhakteḥ sūpāyatvam āha puruṣaḥ sa iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:794: sa mal-lakṣaṇaḥ puruṣo 'nanyayā tad-ekāntayā ananya-cetāḥ satatam iti pūrvoditayā bhaktyaiva labhyo labdhuṃ śakyo yoga-bhaktyā tu duḥśakyā tat-prāptir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:796: sarvam idaṃ jagat yena tataṃ vyāptam /
GE07bhg4c08u:800: vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhaty ekas
GE07bhg4c08u:801: tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam // ity ādyā //22//
GE07bhg4c08u:803: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:804: prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha //23//
GE07bhg4c08u:805: śrīdharaḥ - tad evaṃ paramśvaropāsakās tat-padaṃ prāpya na nivartante /
GE07bhg4c08u:810: yatra yasmin kāle prayātā yogino 'nāvṛttiṃ yānti yasmiṃś ca kāle prayātā āvṛttiṃ yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmīty anvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:811: atra ca raśmy-anusārī ataś cāyane 'pi dakṣiṇe iti sūcita-nyāyenottarāyaādi-kāla-viśeṣa-maraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:812: ca tv avivakṣitatvāt kāla-śabdena kālābhimāninībhir ātivāhikībhir devatābhiḥ prāpyo mārga upalakṣyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:813: ato 'yam arthaḥ yasmin kālābhimāni-devatopalakṣite mārge prayātā yogina upāsakāḥ karmiṇaś ca yathākramam anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ ca yānti /
GE07bhg4c08u:816: aharādi-śabdoktānāṃ kālābhimānitvāt tat-sāhacaryād āmra-vanam ity ādivat kāla-śabdenopalakṣaṇam aviruddham //23//
GE07bhg4c08u:817: madhusūdanaḥ - saguṇa-brahmopāsakās tat-padaṃ prāpya na nivartante kintu krameṇa mucyante /
GE07bhg4c08u:818: tatra tal-loka-bhogāt prāg-anutpanna-samyag-darśanānāṃ tesāṃ mārgāpekṣā vidyate na tu samyag-darśinām iva tad-anapekṣety upāsakānāṃ tal-loka-prāptaye deva-yāna-mārga upadiśyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:820: prāṇotkramaṇānantaraṃ yatra yasmin kāle kālābhimāni-devatopalakṣite mārge prayātā yogino dhyāyinaḥ karmiṇaś cānāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ ca yānti /
GE07bhg4c08u:821: deva-yāne pathi prayātāś ca karmiṇa āvṛttiṃ yānti /
GE07bhg4c08u:822: yadyapi deva-yāne 'pi pathi prayātāḥ punar āvartante ity uktaṃ ābrahma-bhuvanā lokāḥ punar āvartinaḥ ity atra,
GE07bhg4c08u:823: tathāpi pitṛ-yāne pathi gatā āvartanta eva na ke 'pi tatra krama-mukti-bhājaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:824: deva-yāne pathi gatās tu yadyapi kecid āvartante pratīkopāsakās taḍil-loka-paryantaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:825: gatā hiraṇyagarbha-paryantam amānava-puruṣa-nītā api pañcāgni-vidyādy-upāsakā atat-kratavo
GE07bhg4c08u:826: bhogānte nivartanta eva tathāpi daharādy-upāsakāḥ krameṇa mucyante /
GE07bhg4c08u:830: atipraśasta iti stutir upapadyate keṣāṃcid āvṛttāv apy anāvṛtti-phalatvasyānapāyāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:831: taṃ deva-yānaṃ pitṛ-yānaṃ ca kālaṃ kālābhimāni-devatopalakṣitaṃ mārgaṃ vakṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c08u:834: ceti tad-anurodhenaikasmin kāla-pada eva lakṣaṇāśritā kālābhimāni-devatānāṃ mārga-dvaye 'pi bāhulyāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:835: agni-dhūmayos tad-itarayoḥ sator api agnihotra-śabdavad eka-deśenāpy upalakṣaṇaṃ kāla-śabdena /
GE07bhg4c08u:836: anyathā prātar agni-devatāyā abhāvāt tat-prakhyaṃ cānya-śāstram (ṃī.da 1.4.4)
GE07bhg4c08u:837: ity anena tasya nāma-dheyatayā na syāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:839: viśvanāthaḥ --- nanu yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama iti tva-uktyā tvad-bhaktās tvāṃ prāptā na punar āvartanta ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:840: na tatra tva-prāntau kaścin mārga-niyama ity uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:841: tvad-bhaktānāṃ ca guṇātītatvāt tan-mārgo 'pi guṇātīta eva avasīyate,
GE07bhg4c08u:843: yas tu mārgo yogino jñāninaḥ karmiṇaś cāsti tam ahaṃ jijñāse ity apekṣāyām āha yatreti /
GE07bhg4c08u:844: prāṇotkramaṇānantaraṃ tatra kālopalakṣite mārge prayātā anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ ca yānti taṃ kālaṃ mārgaṃ vakṣya ity anvayaḥ //23//
GE07bhg4c08u:845: baladevaḥ -- sva-bhaktānām āvṛttiḥ sva-vimukhānāṃ tv āvṛttir uktā /
GE07bhg4c08u:846: sā sā ca kena pathā gatānāṃ bhaved ity apekṣāyām āha yatreti /
GE07bhg4c08u:849: agni-dhūmayoḥ kālatvābhāvāt kāla-śabdenoktis tu bhūyasā mahad-ādi-śabdānāṃ rātry-ādi-śabdānāṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:850: ca kāla-vācitvāt tathā cārcir-ādibhir dhūmādibhiś ca devaiḥ pālitaḥ panthāḥ kāla-śabdenokto bodhyaḥ //23 //
GE07bhg4c08u:852: agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam /
GE07bhg4c08u:853: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahma-vido janāḥ //24//
GE07bhg4c08u:855: agni-jyotiḥ-śabdābhyāṃ te 'rcir abhisambhavanti iti śruty-uktārcir-abhimāninī devatopalakṣyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:859: etac cānyāsām api śruty-uktānāṃ saṃvatsara devalokādi-devatānam upalakṣaṇārtham /
GE07bhg4c08u:860: evaṃ bhūto yo mārgas tatra prayātā gatā bhagavad-upāsakā janā brahma prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:862: tathā ca śrutiḥ - te 'rciṣam abhi sambhavanti arciṣo 'rahna āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam āpūryamāṇa-pakṣād yān ṣaṇ-māsānudaṅṅāditya eti māsebhyo deva-lokam iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:863: na hi sadyo-mukti-bhājāṃ samyag-darśana-niṣṭhānāṃ gatir vā kvacid asti,
GE07bhg4c08u:865: madhusūdanaḥ - tatropāsakānāṃ deva-yānaṃ panthānam āha agnir iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:866: agnir-jyotir ity arcir abhimāninī devatā lakṣyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:867: ahar ity ahar-abhimāninī śukla-pakṣa iti śukla-pakṣābhimāninī ṣaṇ-māsā uttarāyaṇam
GE07bhg4c08u:868: iti uttarāyaṇa-rūpa-ṣaṇmāsābhimāninī devataiva lakṣyate ātivāhikās tal-liṅgāt (MD 4.3.4) iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:869: etac cānyāsām api śruty-uktānāṃ devatānam upalakṣaṇārtham /
GE07bhg4c08u:870: tathā ca śrutiḥ - te 'rciṣam abhi sambhavanti arciṣo 'rahna āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam āpūryamāṇa-pakṣād
GE07bhg4c08u:871: yān ṣaḍ-uṅṅeti māsāṃs tān māsebhyaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarād ādityam ādityāc candramasaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:872: candramaso vidyutaṃ tat-puruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa enān brahma gamayaty eṣa deva-patho brahma-patha
GE07bhg4c08u:873: etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:874: atra śruty-antarānusārāt saṃvatsarānantaraṃ deva-loka-devatā tato vāyu-devatā tata āditya ity ākare nirṇītam /
GE07bhg4c08u:877: saṃvatsaro deva-loko vāyur ādityaś candramā vidyud-varuṇa indraḥ prajāpatiś cety anuktā api draṣṭavyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:878: tatra deva-yāna-mārge prayātā gacchanti brahma kāryopādhikaṃ kāryaṃ vādarir asya gaty-upapatteḥ (Vs 4.3.7) iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:881: atra etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartanta iti śrutāv imam iti viśeṣaṇāt kalpāntare kecid āvartanta iti pratīyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:884: agni-jyotiḥ-śabdābhyāṃ te 'rciṣam abhisambhavanti iti śruty-uktyārcir-abhimāninī devatopalakṣyate /
GE07bhg4c08u:888: etad-rūpo yo mārgas tatra prayātā brahma-vido jñānino brahma prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:889: tathā ca śrutiḥ - te 'rciṣam abhi sambhavanti arciṣo 'rahna āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam āpūryamāṇa-pakṣād yān ṣaṇ-māsānudaṅṅāditya eti mālebhyo deva-lokam iti //24//
GE07bhg4c08u:892: ahar iti divasābhimānī śukla iti śukla-pakṣābhimāninī /
GE07bhg4c08u:895: chāndogyāḥ paṭhanti - atha yad u caivāsmin śavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣam evābhisaṃbhavanty
GE07bhg4c08u:896: arciṣo 'haraha āpūryamāṇa-pakṣam āpūryamāṇa-pakṣādyān ṣaḍ-udaṇṇeti māsāṃs tān māsebhyaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:897: saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarād ādityam ādityāc candramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tat puruṣo
GE07bhg4c08u:898: 'mānavaḥ sa enān brahma gamayaty eṣa deva-patho brahma-patha etena pratipadyamānā
GE07bhg4c08u:900: asyārthaḥ - asminn akṣi-stha-brahmopāsaka-gaṇe mṛte sati yadi putra-śiṣyādayaḥ śabyaṃ śaba-sambandhi karma dāhādi kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:902: ubhayathāpy akṣatopāsti-phalās te tad-upāsakā arcir-ādibhir devais tam upāsyaṃ prayāntīti sphuṭam anyat /
GE07bhg4c08u:904: vidyutaḥ paratra kramād varuṇendra- prajāpatayo bodhyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:907: ete 'rcir-ādayo devā ity āha sūtra-kāraḥ - ātivāhikās tal-liṅgāt (Vs 4.3.4) iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:908: tathārcir-ādibhir bhagavan-nideśa-sthair dvādaśabhir devaiḥ sevyamānena pathā bhagavantaṃ tad-bhaktāḥ prayānti tataḥ punar nāvartanta iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:911: vidhu-vidyud-varuṇndra-druhiṇaiś cāgāt padaṃ harer muktaḥ // iti //24//
GE07bhg4c08u:913: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam /
GE07bhg4c08u:914: tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate //25//
GE07bhg4c08u:917: rātry-ādi-śabdaiś ca pūrvavad eva rātri-kṛṣṇa-pakṣa-dakṣiṇāyana-rūpa-ṣaṇ-māsābhimāninyas tisro devatā upalakṣyante /
GE07bhg4c08u:918: etābhir devatābhir upalakṣito yo mārgas tatra prayātaḥ karma-yogī cāndramasaṃ jyotis tad-upalakṣitaṃ svarga-lokaṃ prāpya tatreṣṭāpūrta-karma-phalaṃ bhuktvā punar āvartate /
GE07bhg4c08u:919: tatrāpi śrutiḥ-te dhūmam abhi sambhavanti dhūmād rātriṃ rātrer apakṣīyamāṇa-pakṣam
GE07bhg4c08u:920: apakṣīyamāṇa-pakṣād yān ṣaṇmāsān dakṣiṇāditya eti māsebhyaḥ pitṛ-lokaṃ pitṛ-lokāt
GE07bhg4c08u:921: candraṃ te candraṃ prāpya annaṃ bhavanti iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:922: tad evaṃ nivṛtti-karma-sahitopāsanayā krama-muktiḥ kāmya-karmabhiś ca svarga-bhogānantaram āvṛttiḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:924: / kṣudra-karmaṇāṃ tu jantūnām atraiva punaḥ punar janmeti draṣṭavyam //25//
GE07bhg4c08u:925: madhusūdanaḥ - deva-yāna-mārgastuty-arthaṃ pitṛ-yāna-mārgam āha dhūma iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:926: atrāpi dhūma iti dhūmābhimāninī devatā rātrir iti rātry-abhimāninī kṛṣṇa iti kṛṣṇa-pakṣābhimāninī /
GE07bhg4c08u:927: ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam iti dakṣiṇāyanābhimāninī lakṣyate etad apy anyāsāṃ śruty-uktānām upalakṣaṇam /
GE07bhg4c08u:928: tathā hi śrutiḥ -- te dhūmam abhi sambhavanti dhūmād rātriṃ rātrer apara-pakṣam apara-kṣīyamāṇa-pakṣād
GE07bhg4c08u:929: yān ṣaḍ-dakṣiṇaiti māsāṃs tān anite saṃvatsaram abhiprāpnuvanti māsebhyaḥ pitṛ-lokaṃ
GE07bhg4c08u:930: pitṛ-lokād ākāśam ākāśāc candramasam eṣa somo rājā tad-devānām annaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayanti
GE07bhg4c08u:931: tasmin yāvat saṃpātam uṣitvāthaitam evādhvyānaṃ punar nivartante iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:932: tatra tasmin pathi prayātāś cāndramasaṃ jyotiḥ phalaṃ yogī karma-yogīṣṭāpūrta-datta-kārī
GE07bhg4c08u:935: tasmād etasmād āvṛtti-mārgād anāvṛtti-mārgaḥ śreyān ity arthaḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c08u:936: viśvanāthaḥ --- karmiṇām āvṛtti-mārgam āha dhūma iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:938: rātry-ādi-śabdaiś ca pūrvavad eva tat-tad-abhimāninyas tisro devatā lakṣyante /
GE07bhg4c08u:939: etābhir devatābhir upalakṣito yo mārgas tatra prayātaḥ karma-yogī cāndramasaṃ jyotis tad-upalakṣitaṃ svarga-lokaṃ prāpya karma-phalaṃ bhuktvā nivartate //25//
GE07bhg4c08u:940: baladevaḥ - athāvṛtti-patham āha dhūmo rātrir iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:943: chāndogyāḥ paṭhanti - atha ya ime grāma iṣṭā-pūrte dattam ity upāsate te dhūmam abhisambhavanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:944: dhūmād rātriṃ rātrer apara-pakṣam apara-pakṣādyān ṣaḍ-dakṣiṇaiti māsāṃs tān naite saṃvatsaram abhiprāpnuvanti //
GE07bhg4c08u:945: māsebhyaḥ pitṛ-lokaṃ pitṛ-lokād ākāśam ākāśāc candramasam eṣa somo rājā tad devānām annaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayanti /
GE07bhg4c08u:946: tasmin yavāt saṃpātam uṣitvāthaitam evādhvānaṃ punar nivartante (5.10.3-5) iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:947: tathā ca dhūmādibhiḥ pareśa-nideśasthair aṣṭabhir devaiḥ pālitena pathā kāmya-karmiṇaś candra-lokaṃ pāpya bhoga-kṣaye sati tasmāt punar nivartanta iti //25//
GE07bhg4c08u:949: śukla-kṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate /
GE07bhg4c08u:953: ete gatī mārgau jñāna-karmādhikāriṇo jagataḥ śāśvate anādī saṃmate saṃsārasyānāditvāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:954: tayor ekayā śuklayā anāvṛttiṃ mokṣaṃ yāti /
GE07bhg4c08u:956: madhusūdanaḥ - uktau mārgāv upasaṃharati śukla-kṛṣṇe iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:959: te ete śukla-kṛṣṇe gatī mārgau hi prasiddhe sa-guṇa-vidyā-karmādhikāriṇoḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:960: jagataḥ sarvasyāpi śāstra-jñasya śāśvate anādī mate saṃsārasyānāditvāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:961: tayor ekayā śuklayā yāty anāvṛttiṃ kaścit /
GE07bhg4c08u:963: viśvanāthaḥ --- uktau mārgāv upasaṃharati śukla-kṛṣṇe iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:965: ekayā śuklayā anāvṛttiṃ mokṣam anyayā kṛṣṇayā tu punaḥ punar atra jāyate //26//
GE07bhg4c08u:967: arcir-ādir gatiḥ śuklā prakāśa-mayatvāt dhūmādikā gatiḥ kṛṣṇā prakāśa-śūnyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:968: gatiḥ panthā ete gatā jñāna-karmādhikāriṇo jagataḥ śāśvate anādī sammate tasyānāditvāt /
GE07bhg4c08u:971: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaścana /
GE07bhg4c08u:973: śrīdharaḥ - mārga-jñāna-kalaṃ darśayan bhakti-yogam upasaṃharati naite iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:974: ete sṛtī mārgau mokṣa-saṃsāra-prāpakau jānan kaścid api yogī na muhyati /
GE07bhg4c08u:978: madhusūdanaḥ - gater upāsyatvāya tad-vijñānaṃ stauti naite iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:979: ete sṛtī mārgau he pārtha jana krama-mokṣāyaikā punaḥ saṃsārāyāpareti niścinvan yogī
GE07bhg4c08u:980: dhyāna-niṣṭho na muhyati kevalaṃ karma dhūmādi-mārga-prāpakaṃ kartavyatvena na pratyeti
GE07bhg4c08u:982: tasmād yogasthāpunar-āvṛtti-phalatvāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yoga-yuktaḥ samāhita-citto bhavāpunar-āvṛttaye he 'rjuna //27//
GE07bhg4c08u:983: viśvanāthaḥ --- etan-mārga-dvaya-jñānaṃ vivekotpādakam atas tadvantaṃ stauti naite iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:985: baladevaḥ -- etayoḥ pathor bodho viveka-hetur bhavatīti taṃ stauti naita iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:986: sṛtī panthāno jānan arcir-ādi-mokṣāya dhūmādiḥ saṃsārāyeti smaran kaścid api yogī mad-bhakto na muhyati dhūmādi-prāpakaṃ karma kartavyatvena na niścinotīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:993: śrīdharaḥ - adhyāyārtham aṣṭa-praśnārtha-nirṇayaṃ saphalam upasaṃharati vedeṣv iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:998: yat puṇya-phalam upadiṣṭaṃ śāstreṣu tat sarvam atyeti /
GE07bhg4c08u:1000: kiṃ kṛtvā ? idam aṣṭa-praśnārtha-nirṇayenoktaṃ tattvaṃ viditvā /
GE07bhg4c08u:1001: tataś ca yogī jñānī bhūtvā param utkṛṣṭam ādyaṃ jagan mūla-bhūtaṃ sthānaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ prāpnoti //28//
GE07bhg4c08u:1006: madhusūdanaḥ - punaḥ śraddhānu-vṛddhy-arthaṃ yogaṃ stauti vedeṣv iti /
GE07bhg4c08u:1010: dāneṣu tulā-puruṣādiṣu deśe kāle pātre ca śraddhayā samyag-dattesu yat-puṇya-phalaṃ puṇyasya dharmasya phalaṃ svarga-svārājyādi pradiṣṭaṃ śāstreṇa
GE07bhg4c08u:1011: atyety atikrāmati tat sarvam idaṃ pūrvokta-sapta-praśna-nirūpaṇa-dvāreṇoktaṃ viditvā samyag-anuṣṭhāna-prayantam avadhāryānuṣṭhāya ca yogī dhyāna-niṣṭhaḥ
GE07bhg4c08u:1012: na kevalaṃ tad atikrāmati paraṃ sarvotkṛṣṭam aiśvaraṃ sthānam ādyaṃ sarva-kāraṇam upaiti ca pratipadyate ca sarva-kāraṇaṃ brahmaiva prāpnotīty
GE07bhg4c08u:1013: arthaḥ / tad anenādhyāyena dhyeyatvena tat-padārtho vyākhyātaḥ //28//
GE07bhg4c08u:1018: tat sarvam atyeti atikramya ca yogī bhaktimān tato 'pi śreṣṭhaṃ sthānam ādyam aprākṛtaṃ nityaṃ prāpnoti //28//
GE07bhg4c08u:1019: bhaktānāṃ sarvataḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ pūrvoktaṃ teṣv api sphuṭam /
GE07bhg4c08u:1026: dāneṣu deśa-kāla-pātra-parīkṣayā śraddhayā ca samyag-datteṣu yat puṇya-phalaṃ svarga-rājyādi-lakṣaṇaṃ pradiṣṭam uktam /
GE07bhg4c08u:1029: idam adhyāya-dvayoktaṃ bhagavato mama mad-bhakteś ca māhātmyaṃ sat-prasaṅgena viditvā tad-vedana-sukhātiriktaṃ tat sarvaṃ tṛṇāya manyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c08u:1030: tato yogī mad-bhaktimān bhūtvādyam anādi-parama-māyikaṃ mat-sthānam upaiti //28//
